Class CompSciStudent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Student
      • CompSciStudent

  • public class CompSciStudent
extends Student
    This class holds data for a computer science student.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompSciStudent(java.lang.String n, java.lang.String id, int year)
      The Constructor sets the student's name, ID number, and the year admitted.

      The setGenEdHours method sets the number of general ed hours taken.
      void setMathHours(int math)
      The setMathHours method sets the number of math hours taken.

      The toString method returns a string containing the student's data.
